reports.query:
**This is your first dashboard!** 
 
You can click (â‹®) to edit this report, or add a new report to get started. You can run any Cypher query directly from each report and render data in a variety of formats. 
 
Tip: try _renaming_ this report by editing the title text. You can also edit the dashboard header at the top of the screen.

reports.title: Recuento de tipo de industria por cada importaciÃ³n
reports.query:
MATCH (fact:Facts)-[empresaId:Company]->(empresa:Company)
    WITH empresa.DSTIPO_ACTIVIDAD AS property, count(*) AS count
    RETURN property, count

reports.title: Recuento de tipo de Ã­tem por cada importaciÃ³n
reports.query:
MATCH (fact:Facts)-[:producto]->(producto:Product)
    WITH producto.TIPO_ITEM AS property, count(*) AS count
    RETURN property, count

reports.title: Top 5 paÃ­ses exportadores (PaÃ­s Origen)
reports.query:
MATCH (f:Facts)-[:PaisOrigen]->(po:Country)
WITH po.CountryName AS property, SUM(toFloat(f.PRECIO)) AS sum
ORDER BY sum DESC
LIMIT 5
RETURN property, sum

reports.title: Top 5 paÃ­ses exportadores (PaÃ­s Procedencia)
reports.query:
MATCH (f:Facts)-[:PaisProcedencia]->(po:Country)
WITH po.CountryName AS property, SUM(toFloat(f.PRECIO)) AS sum
ORDER BY sum DESC
LIMIT 5
RETURN property, sum

reports.title: Fechas de aprobaciÃ³n por aÃ±o
reports.query:
MATCH (f:Facts)-[:FechaAprobacion]->(fechaAprobacion:Date)
WITH fechaAprobacion.DateYear as property, count(*) as count
RETURN property, count

reports.title: Fechas Definitivas
reports.query:
MATCH (f:Facts)-[:FechaDefinitivo]->(fechaAprobacion:Date)
WITH fechaAprobacion.DateYear as property, count(*) as count
RETURN property, count

reports.title: Importaciones por mes
reports.query:
MATCH (f:Facts)-[:FechaAprobacion]->(fechaAprobacion:Date)
WITH fechaAprobacion.DateMonth as property, count(*) as count
ORDER BY property
RETURN property, count
